title: Stranger Who Found Spring - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Carefree Protagonist   Cohabitation   Family   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Lazy Protagonist   Love at First Sight   Modern Day   Mpreg   Omegaverse   Sleeping   Slow Romance
author: Honey Bird   허니버드
description:
“Congratulations. You are eight weeks pregnant.”
“…ah.”

After a one-night stand.
A stranger came to Ha-hyun.

He didn’t worry about money, he had plenty of time. Although it might have only one parent when it was born, Ha-hyun decided to have a child.

However.
“…pregnant.”
“What?”
“You are pregnant, right?”

Suddenly, Cho-seung, a one-night opponent, came to Ha-hyun…
With this, Ha-hyun thought there were two strangers.

“Oh my God, they are twins.”
“Pardon?”
“Ho…”

Three strangers came to Ha-hyun in spring.

Can Ha-hyun, Cho-seung, and the two children remain in a reassuring relationship just by the fact that they are with each other?>
